restaurant_talks_explanation:
This is an app aimed at improving operations in restaurants.
Its primary goal is to enhance communication between the hall and the kitchen.
Designed for use in the field, it focuses on a design that can be used quickly and easily with just a few taps with tablets and phones.
home_message:
Hello and welcome, to my website! 
I'm Yushi Nogami (野上雄史) / yanoo (ヤヌー), a Flutter mobile developer. 
Feel free to reach out via the Contact tab. 
When I'm not working, I enjoy talking to people, running and playing drums. 
Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to connecting with you!
